definitions.text: the undulating movement of the surface of the open sea
a rounded elevation (especially one on an ocean floor)
a crescendo followed by a decrescendo
a man who is much concerned with his dress and appearance
increase in size, magnitude, number, or intensity
examples: The music swelled to a crescendo

definitions.text: become filled with pride, arrogance, or anger
examples: The mother was swelling with importance when she spoke of her son
The bellies of the starving children are swelling

definitions.text: come up (as of feelings and thoughts, or other ephemeral things)
come up, as of a liquid

examples: had a great time at the party
